title: Graphical interface Final Fantasy VII PC game converter
description:
Graphical interface Final Fantasy VII PC game converter version 0.0.0.1  to prepare game for mods
Supports English, German, French and Spanish versions

Tested on english original release and Re-release
need translators and bug testers due to my testing limitations

Does check for pirated versions but won't prevent you installing unlike the original

Pretty basic.
Unrar
Mount the included ISO or rename any drive to FF7DISC1
Run the executable as admin
If it does not detect where game is installed or points to the wrong place you can choose location
Same with movies
Ensure you have the correct language selected corresponding to your installed language
click begin
for me conversion takes less than a minute
use created desktop shortcuts to play
once complete you can install mods. go here to find all details
 <a href="
http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=13212.0" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?topic=13212.0</a>

If you like the game buy it
